mail.subject: New invoice from emallofmauritius.com No. ${input.code}
mail.content:
Dear ${input.billingInformation.firstName} ${input.billingInformation.lastName}
Thank you for using emallofmauritius.com

Your order as shown below has been registered. emallofmauritius.com will review the order and approve or reject it.

${html}
Kind regards,
Sales team
ArchNet ltd

click here to approve or reject the order

action.display:
Your order as shown below has been saved into our system. emallofmauritius.com will review the order and approve or reject it.
